}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Numerous sources seem to indicate this device uses RT2870 + RT2820.
Additional specifications, per '''[[Philips]]''' manual, follow.. *Power consumption: 2.25 '''W''' *Weight: 55 g *Dimensions: 22 mm x 79 mm x 93 mm
{{WiFiCert|WFA5600|10/16/2007}}
